column4: hey guys, if you host a dns then would that allow you to regester a domain for free?
You asked about domain names and dns didn't you.
Are you getting a static line with your own block or IP's?
at the same time you are hosting on your ISP's IP block.
go to godaddy.com and register a domain name for around $8 a yr and then find someone to host your dns...
Administration and they have to worry about the up keep and uptimes.
Look into wimax....  It's not too far away.....  WEG

well i was wandering around my apt thinking about it =o)
